definition: to edge-join boards with glue to form a panel (woodworking)
to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Preferably the figure of the parallel hexagon piece looks like unsymmetrical swallowtail.
sentences.chinese: 所述平行六边形拼板优选为非对称燕尾形。

sentences.english: The kids are playing bilingual jigsaw puzzle.
There are several reasons for that – it’s a puzzle with many pieces.
sentences.chinese: 降级有好几个原因，就像拼图有好多拼板那样。
这是一种智力拼板游戏。

sentences.english: Putting together the regional picture is like a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 把地区图景拼合起来就像一个拼板游戏。

sentences.english: An old man just row a boat five minutes ago.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚有个雅美老人划著拼板舟过去。

sentences.english: We have added a major piece to that puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了那个拼图的最主要的拼板。

sentences.english: We suggest waste tabs connected around the panel to have it stronger.
sentences.chinese: 建议附边与拼板相连以增加强度。

sentences.english: Hua Rongdao is a very famous puzzled of China.
sentences.chinese: “华容道”是中国古代传统单人玩的拼板类游戏。

sentences.english: We are trying to put the jigsaw puzzle together.
sentences.chinese: 我们想把这些拼板都拼起来。

definition: mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon)
medium-density fiberboard (MDF)/abbr. to 中纖板|中纤板[zhong1 xian1 ban3]
pinyin: zhong1 mi4 du4 xian1 wei2 ban3

definition: mortise and tenon (slot and tab forming a carpenter's joint)
